sentence.Network_en: "I'm awfully sorry," she told him regretfully.
sentence.Network_cn: “我非常抱歉”，她懊悔地向他说道。

sentence.Network_en: The mate observed regretfully that he could not account for that young fellow's whims.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位伙伴很遗憾地说他不能说出那年轻人产生怪念头的原因.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... regretful 后悔的 regretfully 懊悔地 regretless 无悔的.

tell_百度百科 ... tell plainly 明白地告诉 tell regretfully 遗憾地说 tell reverently 敬言.
die regretfully 遗憾的等死  that old man here is me 这个老家伙就是现在的我  whta i've felt 我的感觉  what i've known 我的所知  never shined.

entry.def: If you are regretful, you show that you regret something.

example.ex: Mr Griffin gave a regretful smile...
example.tran: 格里芬先生遗憾地笑了笑。

example.ex: Surprisingly, she didn't feel nervous, or regretful about her actions.
example.tran: 令人惊讶的是，她并没有对她的行为感到紧张或后悔。

sentences.sentence: "I must regretfully decline your kind invitation"

auth_sentence.content: Regretfully, the same folks that object to fossil fuels also object to nuclear power.
auth_sentence.res_content: Regretfully, the same folks that object to fossil fuels also object to nuclear power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Regretfully, the same folks that object to fossil fuels also object to nuclear power.

auth_sentence.content: Regretfully, "in this study area, most of the burial mounds are destroyed," Hendrickx said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Regretfully, "in this study area, most of the burial mounds are destroyed," Hendrickx said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Regretfully, "in this study area, most of the burial mounds are destroyed," Hendrickx said.

auth_sentence.content: Churches on the whole have standardised on the loop, but regretfully all theatres have standardised on the Infra-red system.
auth_sentence.res_content: Churches on the whole have standardised on the loop, but regretfully all theatres have standardised on the Infra-red system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Churches on the whole have standardised on the loop, but regretfully all theatres have standardised on the Infra-red system.
